Verses: 1 aindhaam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Vaanaththilirundhu Boomiyinmel Vizhundha Oru Natchaththiraththaik Kanden; Avanukkup Paadhaalakkuzhiyin Thiravukol Kodukkappattadhu.
2 avan Paadhaalakkuzhiyaith Thirandhaan; Udane Perunjoolaiyin Pugaiyaippola Andhak Kuzhiyilirundhu Pugaiezhumbitru; Andhak Kuzhiyin Pugaiyil Sooriyanum Aagaayamum Andhagaarappattadhu.
3 andhap Pugaiyilirundhu Vettukkiligal Purappattup Boomiyinmel Vandhadhu; Avaigalukkup Boomiyilulla Thelgalin Vallamaikkoppaana Vallamai Kodukkappattadhu.

4 boomiyin Pullaiyum Pasumaiyaana Endhap Poondaiyum Endha Maraththaiyum Sedhappaduththaamal, Thangal Netrigalil Dhevanudaiya Muththiraiyaith Thariththiraadha Manusharaimaaththiram Sedhappaduththa Avaigalukku Uththaravu Kodukkappattadhu.

5 melum Avargalaik Kolaiseyyumpadikku Avaigalukku Uththaravu Kodukkappadaamal, Aindhumaadhamalavum Avargalai Vedhanaippaduththumpadikku Uththaravu Kodukkappattadhu; Avaigal Seyyumvedhanai Thelaanadhu Manusharaik Kottumpodhu Undaagum Vedhanaiyaiyaippolirukkum.
6 annaatkalil Manushargal Saavaiththediyum Adhaik Kaanaadhiruppaargal, Saagavendumendru Aasaippaduvaargal, Saavo Avargalukku Vilagi Odippom.

7 andha Vettukkiligalin Uruvam Yuththaththirku Aayaththampannappatta Kudhiraigalukku Oppaayirundhadhu; Avaigaludaiya Thalaigalinmel Ponmayamaana Kireedam Pondravaigalirundhana; Avaigalin Mugangal Manusharudaiya Mugangalpolirundhana.
8 avaigaludaiya Koondhal Sthireegaludaiya Koondhalpolirundhadhu; Avaigalin Parkal Singangalin Parkalpolirundhana.
9 irumbuk Kavasangalaippola Maarkkavasangal Avaigalukku Irundhana; Avaigaludaiya Siragugalin Iraichchal Yuththaththirku Odugira Anegang Kudhiraigal Poonda Radhangalin Iraichchalukku Oppaayirundhana.

10 avaigal Thelgalin Vaalgalukku Oppaana Vaalgalaiyum, Andha Vaalgalil Kodukkugalaiyum Udaiyavaigalaayirundhana; Avaigal Aindhu Maadhamalavum Manusharaich Sedhappaduththuvadharku Adhigaaramudaiyavaigalaayirundhana.
11 avaigalukku Oru Raajan Undu, Avan Paadhaalaththin Thoodhan; Ebireyu Baashaiyile Apeththon Endrum, Girekku Baashaiyile Appolliyon Endrum Avanukkup Peyar.
12 mudhalaam Aabaththu Kadandhupoyitru; Ivaigalukkuppinbu Innum Irandu Aabaththugal, Idho, Varugiradhu.
13 aaraam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Avanukku Munbaaga Irundha Porpeedaththin Naangu Kombugalilumirundhu Oru Saththandhondri,
14 ekkaalaththaip Pidiththirundha Aaraam Thoodhanai Nokki: Aippiraaththennum Periya Nadhiyandaiyile Kattappattirukkira Naangu Thoodhargalaiyum Avizhththuvidu Endru Sollakketten.

15 appozhudhu Manusharil Moondrilorupangaik Kollumbadikku Orumanineraththirkum, Oru Naalukkum, Oru Maadhaththirkum, Oru Varushaththirkum Aayaththamaakkappattirundha Andha Naangu Thoodhargalum Avizhththuvidappattaargal.
16 kudhiraichsenaigalaagiya Raanuvangalin Thogai Irubadhu Kodiyaayirundhadhu; Avaigalin Thogaiyaich Sollakketten.

17 kudhiraigalaiyum Avaigalinmel Eriyirundhavargalaiyum Naan Tharisanaththil Kandavidhamaavadhu; Avargal Akkininiramum Neelaniramum Gandhaganiramumaana Maarkkavasangalaiyudaiyavargalaayirundhaargal; Kudhiraigaludaiya Thalaigal Singangalin Thalaigalaippolirundhana; Avaigaludaiya Vaaigalilirundhu Akkiniyum Pugaiyum Gandhagamum Purappattana.
18 avaigaludaiya Vaaigalilirundhu Purappatta Akkini Pugai Gandhagam Ennum Immoondrinaalum Manusharil Moondrilorupangu Kollappattaargal.

19 andhak Kudhiraigalin Vallamai Avaigaludaiya Vaayileyum Vaalgalileyum Irukkiradhu; Avaigaludaiya Vaalgal Paampugalukku Oppaanavaigalaayum, Thalaigalullavaigalaayumirukkiradhu, Avaigalaale Sedhappaduththugiradhu.

20 appadiyirundhum, Andha Vaadhaigalaal Kollappadaadha Matra Manushargal Peygalaiyum, Pon Velli Sembu Kalmaram Enbavaigalaal Seyyappattavaigalaayum Kaanavum Ketkavum Nadakkavumaattaadhavaigalaayumirukkira Vikkiragangalaiyum Vanangaadhapadikkuth Thangal Kaigalin Kiriyaigalai Vittu Manandhirumbavumillai;
21 thangal Kolaipaadhagangalaiyum, Thangal Sooniyangalaiyum, Thangal Vesiththanangalaiyum, Thangal Kalavugalaiyum Vittu Manandhirumbavumillai.
